item.title: Spoke in the House
item.description:
on 175th Anniversary of Saguenay—Lac-Saint-Jean
Mr. Speaker, the first settlers arrived in Saguenay—Lac-Saint-Jean on June 11, 1838. Today, the region is celebrating its 175th anniversary. On this occasion, I want to ...
